medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with 2 days of intermittent abdominal pain without radiation. Symptoms include anorexia yesterday, nausea without emesis, and passing regular flatus. The last bowel movement was two days prior to admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, Hypertension, History of colon cancer, Constipation, Glaucoma, Peripheral neuropathy, Benign prostatic hypertrophy, Right hip arthroplasty, Previous exploratory laparotomy with small bowel resection and ingrown mesh, Colon resection for colon cancer, Ventral hernia repair with mesh.
